data.prayer: Spirit, help the 13,450 believers find a person of peace today among the 1,081,151 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Alpes-Maritimes, Provence-Alpes-Côte d‘Azur, France
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Alpes-Maritimes, Provence-Alpes-Côte d‘Azur, France a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the county.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, we rejoice that you who began a good work in the church of Alpes-Maritimes, Provence-Alpes-Côte d‘Azur, France will carry it on to completion until the day of Jesus Christ!
data.verse: being confident of this, that he who began a good work in you will carry it on to completion until the day of Christ Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, help media producers communicate the gospel in a way that is understandable to the people of Alpes-Maritimes, Provence-Alpes-Côte d‘Azur, France.
data.verse: But from there, you will seek the LORD your God, and you will find Him if you search for Him with all your heart and all your soul.

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Berber, Kabyle people. 1.5% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Father, you said, "The earth belongs to Me and all that is in it". Please, call Alpes-Maritimes, Provence-Alpes-Côte d‘Azur, France into obedience and eternal life.
data.verse: The earth is Yahweh’s, with its fullness; the world, and those who dwell therein.

data.prayer: Father, reveal your kingdom to those with a childlike heart in the county of Alpes-Maritimes.
data.verse: At that time, Jesus answered, “I thank you, Father, Lord of heaven and earth, that you hid these things from the wise and understanding, and revealed them to infants. Yes, Father, for so it was well-pleasing in your sight.

data.section_summary:
the county of Alpes-Maritimes, Provence-Alpes-Côte d‘Azur, France has a population of 1,094,600.

We estimate Alpes-Maritimes has 13,450 people who might know Jesus, 669,370 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 411,781 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 81 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the county of Alpes-Maritimes words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."
